title: Is Janna Great or What?
body:
Almost 5 wins in a row. The game I lost... was with a Jhin jungle on ranked... -_- 

https://s10.postimg.org/awkwyjcw9/11111.png

replies.body: Janna is such a good support but I find her so boring to play.

> [{quoted}](name=Galacticamaru,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=be1AY1ho,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-22T08:02:48.970+0000)
>
> Janna is such a good support but I find her so boring to play.

Its only boring if your adc/team plays passive. But... if they are agressive you can make some plays with ur bubbles/wind/ult/slows
I love your go-fast build. Looks like my old Dominion one.  Yes, Janna is great.
except on dominion you gotta rush mobis, and it should be on rammus
You make it sound as if there are other builds

> [{quoted}](name=Liquid Sloth,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=be1AY1ho,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-22T04:20:11.473+0000)
>
> Almost 5 wins in a row. The game I lost... was with a Jhin jungle on ranked... -_- 
> 
>

Jhin Jungle... Ouch
Yep, she is freelo for a long time now.

Yes Janna is wonderful. Only about 250k off of one million mastery on her.

There's more speed to be had once you get 15 stacks on mejais which is where I prefer to get my extra speed rather than ludens/lichbane (which I can rarely justify over an aegis), plus the ap from mejais boosts your w for that go fast life.
